scripts.start_chromium: npx playwright test --headed --project chromium && npx monocart show-report monocart-report/index.html
scripts.start_webkit: npx playwright test --headed --project webkit && npx monocart show-report monocart-report/index.html
scripts.start_gecko: npx playwright test --headed --project firefox && npx monocart show-report monocart-report/index.html
